resources.string: It\'s Meditation app, fling right to get more info!
On main screen you can get horoscope information and track your mood to get some recommendations
Also there is a player which will provide you with some cool relaxing tracks
Good! We recommend you calm down even more! Click to listen to some calm music
Relaxation is not a jedi path. Go make some star war and click here to listen to some cool music
Focus on friendship! Good friendship always goes with this track - click to listen!
